attributes.action: Give every family who chooses to electively home educate funding to aid learning
attributes.additional_details: By educating at home , ehe parents save thousands of pounds in the uk economy each year. Many are not affluent people and are supported by in work benefits. A one of resource box up to £100 would ensure a level playing field across all EHE families. The £500 budget may be used towards travel cards , parking fees for country parks , educational services or additional resources over the course of the year. In ks4 this can be used toward exam fees
attributes.background:
Provide home educating families with a starter box  up to the value of £150 and a yearly budget of up to £950.
Things that may be included  - exercise books/ paper , calculator, abacus,recipe books, science tools, whiteboard,number link blocks, periodic table , world map etc.. to be compiled by la

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want a box worth £150 and a budget of £950 as set out in the first paragraph, or a box of £100 and a budget of £500 as set out in the second paragraph. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
